segments.text: My attention keeps returning to that stool the boy is on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks incredibly unstable, its legs are splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so far, leaning into the cabinet, completely off-balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see it tilting backward, just slightly, but enough to worry me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll be tumbling down to the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing close, but she won't be able to catch him effectively.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the clatter of the stool and the cookie jar shattering.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is making me quite nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why hasn't anyone secured that stool better?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a serious hazard, and it's just waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The image of him falling with a plate in his hand is unsettling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them about the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kind of recklessness really bothers me.
segments.speaker: PAR
